synopsis.text: Set 150 years ago in the cursed town of Planie, a mysterious disease has spread, turning people into the undead. The young priest Kanae resides in a church on the outskirts, striving to help the afflicted townspeople. Since his arrival, the disease's outbreak has slowed. However, when an enigmatic stranger comes to Planie, the town's fate begins to shift. Together, Kanae and this newcomer may uncover the truth behind the sinister plague, though dangers await them on the path ahead.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
